column1: I'm utterly disgusted with myself and overwhelmed with guilt at the mere thought of inflicting harm upon my own person.

I am light years ahead of the released tankouban being sold here. The thrill of waiting for the next release won't be the same anymore, but I refuse to feel even the slightest hint of remorse. The immense sadness and disappointment I feel towards the situation cannot be put into words.
I am overwhelmed by the sheer joy that his gracious presence brings, and I am still feeling it intensely even in this moment.
